H0.text: Tides have the greatest effect on the state of matter of water, which cycles through the three states of matter—solid, liquid, and gas—on Earth.

H1.text: Gravity has the greatest effect on the state of matter of water as it cycles through the solid, liquid, and gaseous states on Earth.

H2.text: The sun has the greatest effect on the state of matter of water that cycles through its three states—solid, liquid, and gas—on Earth.

H3.text: The moon has the greatest effect on the state of matter of water that cycles through solid, liquid, and gas on Earth.

A4.text: The water cycle is powered by the energy emitted from the sun.

A5.text: Heat is absorbed as water transitions from the liquid to the vapor phase through evaporation.
